tool_description: The TEXTKING Translation API is a RESTful web service to access and manage translation projects on https://www.textking.com. You can use the translation API to integrate high quality human translation into your own software and streamline your translation workflow.
name: TEXTKING Translation
title: TEXTKING Translation

api_list.name: Upload source document
api_list.description: Uploads the source document for a job.

required_parameters.name: documentname
required_parameters.description: A valid file name for the uploaded file.

api_list.name: Get language
api_list.description: Returns a single language with the given ISO 639 language code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com/language/de"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com/language/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List source languages
api_list.description: Returns a collection of all source languages supported by TEXTKING.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Return search results starting at a given page. Used for paging through more than one page of results.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: An integer value defining how many entries should be returned. Only values between 1 and 100 (both inclusive) are allowed. If not given, this defaults to 100.

api_list.name: List topics
api_list.description: Returns a collection of all available topics.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: An integer value defining how many entries should be returned. Only values between 1 and 100 (both inclusive) are allowed. If not given, this defaults to 100.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Return search results starting at a given page. Used for paging through more than one page of results.

api_list.name: List projects
api_list.description: Returns a collection of projects of the authorized customer.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: An integer value defining how many entries should be returned. Only values between 1 and 100 (both inclusive) are allowed. If not given, this defaults to 100.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Return search results starting at a given page. Used for paging through more than one page of results.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Filter projects by status: prepared, running, finished, canceled

api_list.name: Download source document
api_list.description: Downloads the source document for a job.

api_list.name: List target languages

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Return search results starting at a given page. Used for paging through more than one page of results.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: An integer value defining how many entries should be returned. Only values between 1 and 100 (both inclusive) are allowed. If not given, this defaults to 100.

api_list.name: Get price info for word count
api_list.description: Returns price information for a specific number of words for all available quality levels.

required_parameters.name: words
required_parameters.description: An integer value defining the number of words to translate.

required_parameters.name: source_language
required_parameters.description: ISO 639 language code of the source language.

required_parameters.name: target_language
required_parameters.description: ISO 639 language code of the target language.

api_list.name: Get project
api_list.description: Returns a single project with the given ID.

api_list.name: Get topic
api_list.description: Returns a single topic area with the given ID.

api_list.name: Get job
api_list.description: Returns a single job with the given ID.

api_list.name: Download translated document
api_list.description: Downloads the translated document for a job.

api_list.name: List a project's jobs
api_list.description: Returns a collection of jobs for a project.

required_parameters.name: per_page
required_parameters.description: An integer value defining how many entries should be returned. Only values between 1 and 100 (both inclusive) are allowed. If not given, this defaults to 100.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Return search results starting at a given page. Used for paging through more than one page of results.

api_list.name: Create job
api_list.description: Creates a new job for a project and returns the result.

api_list.name: Create project
api_list.description: Creates a new project and returns the result.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com/projects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com/projects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textkingv1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get price info for document
api_list.description: Return price information for a document.

required_parameters.name: source_language
required_parameters.description: ISO 639 language code of the source language.

required_parameters.name: target_language
required_parameters.description: ISO 639 language code of the target language.
